dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:1,600,000 (E 79째22'00"--E 82째04'00"/N 10째02'00"--N 5째43'00"). Relief shown by hachures. Provinces are outlined in colour. Includes vignettes along the margins: Lake of Kandy -- Adam's Peak -- Colombo -- Temple of Buddha, Kalany -- Ruins of a Dagoda, Toophramaya . Prime meridian: Greenwich. Likely from: Tallis's illustrated atlas and modern history of the world : geographical, political, commercial and statistical / edited by R. MontgomeryMartin. London ; New York : John Tallis & Co., 1851.|21 x 30 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,600,000|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
dc_publisher_s: John Tallis & Company; London & New York
